text: Reducing is a 1931 American comedy movie directed by Charles Reisner and starring Marie Dressler, Polly Moran, Anita Page, Lucien Littlefield, William Collier, Jr., Sally Eilers. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. == Other websites == * Category:1931 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Reisner
title: Reducing (movie)
